dc:title: Reflections On The Connection
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Focuses on drug addiction which she first encountered in prison. Attends a performance of the play "The Connection" about drug addicts. Lauds the play and reiterates Peter's vision of building a society where it is easier to be good. Says we cannot change people.
